solution_line_template: They saved for {num_months} months which is {num_months} months * {weeks_per_month} weeks/month = <<{num_months}*{weeks_per_month}={total_weeks}>>{total_weeks} weeks
So in {num_months} months, they will have ${weekly_savings}/week * {total_weeks} weeks = $<<{weekly_savings}*{total_weeks}={total_savings}>>{total_savings}
